text: *Kasper Juul Hermansen* posted an update for *Daily Standup*

attachments.fallback:
How do you feel today?
I feel tired
attachments.title: How do you feel today?

attachments.fallback:
What did you do since yesterday?
Yesterday, I got the full CI/CD pipeline to work.
attachments.text: Yesterday, I got the full CI/CD pipeline to work.
attachments.title: What did you do since yesterday?

attachments.fallback:
What will you do today?
Today, I will decide on a frontend framework, read up on react, redux, saga, next etc. And setup a basic template project
attachments.text: Today, I will decide on a frontend framework, read up on react, redux, saga, next etc. And setup a basic template project
attachments.title: What will you do today?

attachments.pretext:
Participation: *50%*
Keep up the good work! :tada:
